thread.title: Dr Mohmad H Tantary.
thread.title_full: Medmastery bewertet von Dr Mohmad H Tantary.

author: Dr Mohmad H Tantary.
title: Dr Mohmad H Tantary.
text:
The mechanical ventilation course was awesome.
Need more lectures from Josh Cosa.
Fluid and electrolytes section was great.
Would request Dr Joel Topf to discuss some more nephrology topics like AKI, CKD and glomerulonephrits and other nephropathies ,hypertension etc.
His way of explaining is simply outstanding.
